Adel Adham (Arabic; March 8, 1928 - February 1, 1996) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya maka ngosipụta ya nke ihe ọjọọ na ndị na-edoghị anya.
A mụrụ Adel Adham n'abalị 8 ọnwa Machị, afọ 1928 na Alexandria, Ijipt, nna ya bụ onye Ijipt na nne ya bụ onye Egypt-Turkish.
Oge izizi ya na ihe nkiri bụ n'afọ 1945 na ihe nkiri Laila, Daughter of the Poor (1945).
Na ihe nkiri ya kachasị ọhụrụ tupu ọnwụ ya, onye ọzọ gwara onye ya na ọ ga-aga hel
Nzaghachi nke onye Adham? "Ọ dị mma, ọ bụrụ na anyị gaa n'eluigwe, anyị agaghị ahụ onye ọ bụla anyị maara!"
